thread.title_full: Holby City spoilers: Trailer reveals violent scenes ahead for abused Dom and nasty Isaac

author: Duncan Lindsay
title: Holby City spoilers: Trailer reveals violent scenes ahead for abused Dom and nasty Isaac
text:
Things are about to get worse for abused Dom in devastating Holby City scenes as controlling Isaac’s violent behaviour steps up a gear, prompting those who care for Dom to step up and try and convince him to leave his destructive relationship. But, trapped by a man whom Dom thinks loves him, will he be brave enough to speak out? 
A newly released trailer shows Isaac lashing out at Dom, as well as telling him that he ‘fixed’ him. When Zosia spots Dom examining his injuries, she confronts him over what Isaac has been doing and tries to persuade him that it is violent abuse – but Dom tells her that Isaac is just intense and genuinely cares for him.
The relationship between sinister Isaac and Dom has been troubling viewers for some time and the storyline will get even darker in coming weeks as viewers get an even deeper insight into their home life.
(Picture: BBC) With Isaac’s anger issues and controlling nature out of control, Dom is in danger and his loved ones have never been more concerned.
Can he escape Isaac’s clutches or is his nightmare only just beginning?
Holby City airs every Tuesday at 8pm on BBC One.
